## ImageLayer class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class ImageLayer implements mapboxgl.CustomLayerInterface 
```
<b>Implements:</b> mapboxgl.CustomLayerInterface

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(id, option)](./mapbox-gl-layers.imagelayer._constructor_.md) | Constructs a new instance of the <code>ImageLayer</code> class |

## Example

```ts
const layer = new ImageLayer('layer-id', {
  url: '/4326.png',
  projection: 'EPSG:4326',
  // ref: https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/style-spec/layers/#paint-raster-raster-resampling
  resampling: 'nearest',
  coordinates: [
    [105.289838, 32.204171], // top-left
    [110.195632, 32.204171], // top-right
    [110.195632, 28.164713], // bottom-right
    [105.289838, 28.164713], // bottom-left
  ],
})

map.addLayer(layer)
```
